DOC.brief_summary: Many Americans live paycheck paycheck . This may lead financial stress increase overall stress . People stress likely smoke , consume alcohol , eat poor diet , experience depression anxiety . Experiencing financial stress may also increase risk heart disease . The purpose research study test whether participate Financial Success Program improve health outcome , woman participate child .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Financial Success Education Program Women Children
DOC.criteria: Women 19 year old enrol Financial Success Program fall 2011 winter 2012 and/or child ( ren ) age 318 year attend daycare mother Women must employ enrolled Financial Success Program Able willing provide inform consent Women le 19 year age Women work night time shift ( due variability diurnal cortisol secretion ) Known pregnancy plan pregnancy ( due variability blood pressure , glucose , weight , lipid ) Women exclude Financial Success Program living domestic violence situation abuse alcohol illicit drug
